description: A unique archipelago formed from the roots of the world's largest mangrove trees, Yarukiman Mangrove. The island is divided into 79 groves, each with different purposes and establishments.

keyMoments.title: Admiral Kizaru Arrives
keyMoments.description: Admiral Kizaru arrives at the Sabaody Archipelago, marking the escalation of the Marine assault on the island.
keyMoments.significance: The arrival of an Admiral transforms Sabaody from a pirate sanctuary into a death trap.

keyMoments.title: Multiple Pacifista Across Archipelago
keyMoments.description: Multiple Pacifista units appear across different groves of the Sabaody Archipelago, creating simultaneous battles.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the coordinated Marine operation across the entire archipelago.

statusHistory.description: Major pirate gathering point and last stop before Fishman Island

description: One of the 79 groves of the Sabaody Archipelago where Admiral Kizaru first appears and demonstrates his powers.

keyMoments.title: Kizaru Appears at Grove 27
keyMoments.description: Admiral Kizaru arrives at Grove 27, seeking information about Sentomaru from the terrified pirates.
keyMoments.significance: The specific location where Kizaru first demonstrates his overwhelming power.

keyMoments.title: Mangrove Tree Destroyed
keyMoments.description: Kizaru's light-speed kick topples one of the massive mangrove trees at Grove 27.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the destructive power that threatens the very structure of the archipelago.

statusHistory.description: One of the groves affected by the Marine assault

description: One of the 79 groves of the Sabaody Archipelago where the Straw Hat Pirates encounter a Pacifista unit.

keyMoments.title: Straw Hats Face Pacifista
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates encounter a Pacifista at Grove 12, which surprises them by shooting a laser instead of a shockwave attack.
keyMoments.significance: Brings the Straw Hat crew into direct conflict with the Pacifista threat.

statusHistory.description: Location of Straw Hat Pirates' Pacifista encounter
